free: #e My name is Kagaw Nawkeh.
#c 我的名字是Kagaw Nawkeh。
#n 發音人完整名字應為Kagaw na Yukeh，此處na Yukeh連音成Kagaw nawkeh。
#e And my father is Yukeh Naupas.
#c 然後我爸爸的名字是Yukeh Naupas。
#e My mother is Laway Naupas.
#c 我媽媽的名字是Laway Naupas。
#e My grandfather is Yupas na Talaw.
#c 我爺爺叫Yupas na Talaw。
#e And there were still (other) elderly people—Yupas Talaw, Talaw na Kuwi', and Kuwi' Qangqang.
#c 還有Yupas Talaw、Talaw na Kuwi'以及Kuwi' Qangqang這些祖先。
#e My name is Kagaw, Kagaw nawkeh.
#c 我的名字是Kagaw Nawkeh。
#e My mother is Laway Naupas.
#c 我媽媽的名字叫Laway Naupas。
#e When we were young, we went to work.
#c 在我們小的時候，我們去工作。
#n ti su 合用，意指「在....時候」
#n 汶水泰雅不同村之間有b/v, c/s等發音上的差異。清安村發音人較年輕一輩的詞彙已無b和c的音，但較年長的發音人的部分詞彙仍保留b和c的音。此篇語料係依照發音人的發音而給予標記。
#e We would go working, and my father and mother would bring us to work.
#c 我們會去工作，然後我爸爸媽媽會帶我們去工作。
#n ras-un (帶，受焦型)；ma-ras (帶，主焦型)
#n 並列結構中ru/ki擇其一，不可同時出現。
#e We were quite little children then.
#c 我們還很小哦。
#e We had not studied by that time.
#c 我們還沒唸書。
#n viru 意指「書；唸書」 (C'uli借字)，無焦點變化。
#e And we went to work.
#c 然後我們去工作。
#n tuvux-un (播種，受焦型)
#n tuvux-un (播種，受焦型)
#e The work was to do sowing in the dry land. (We) did sowing and reaping.
#c (這些)工作就是去旱地播種，播種和收割。
#n kalh-un (收割，受焦型)；kalh-an (收割，處焦型)
#e And while we were having a rest, an elderly woman taught us how to weave.
#c 然後，我們休息的時候，年長的祖母會教我們編織。
#n pa-hangngiq-un (讓...休息，受焦型)
#e When I was sixteen years old...when I was sixteen, I learned weaving. The elderly
#e woman taught me about it, and then I knew how.
#c 當我十六歲的時候，十六歲的時候，我就學會編織。Yaki教我，我就會了。
#n kaal為標準發音，kan為誤讀。
#n汶水泰雅口語語料中會有語助詞和其他功能詞(主題標記、連接詞、主格)等連讀的現象（lga, lru, lgi, lku, etc.）。目前將此類例子拆解為兩個單位標記。
#e Yes, (we) started.
#c 是的，開始一直。
#n uwal和uwan為free variation。
#e I became more and more adept (at weaving).
#c 我愈來愈會(織布)。
#n Aruwa aruwa為片語，意指「愈來愈...」；araruwa一字亦可表達同樣意義。
#e I learned all of the weaving skills, including very difficult ones.
#c 我學全部的編織方法，包括困難的。
#n 汶水泰雅口語語料中會有語助詞和其他功能詞(主題標記、連接詞、主格)等連讀的現象（lga, lru, lgi, lku, etc.）。目前將此類例子拆解為兩個單位標記。
#e And then, I knew how (to weave). I was able (to weave).
#c 然後我會了，我會。
#e Yes. Yes. (We) went to work and. We did the sowing and then finished it.
#c 是的是的，去工作，然後。播種，然後結束播種。
#n naqaru' 與naqaru-un 皆為受焦型動詞。
#e In the past, the elderly rested at home, and now we the elder ones rested at home before.
#c 以前的老人們在家休息，我們這些老人(包括說話者自己，現在)以前在家休息。
#n Kuing ka navakis ‘我這個老人家'
#n Sami ka 'ul-'ulaqi' ‘我們這些小孩們'
#e Women did the weaving and Men went hunting.
#c 婦女們編織，男人們去打獵。
#e Men went hunting, and looked for food.
#c 男人們去打獵，找菜。
#n Raramat為食物之意，可指青菜或肉類
#n Kiyum-un(尋找，受焦型) ; kinum-an (尋找，處焦型)
#n M-ataga- (變成；主焦型)
#n Sahu (客家人)
#n Patagasahuan要變成像客家人一樣去賺錢 (引申成賺錢的工作)
#n M-ataga- (變成；主焦型)
#n Sahu (客家人)
#n Patagasahuan要變成像客家人一樣去賺錢 (引申成賺錢的工作)
#e There was no such a thing as buying food in the past. We couldn't do food-buying because we had no money, and no job to do to make
#e money. We had no money and men went to look for food in the mountains.
#c 以前沒有買菜這種事。我們不會買東西吃，因為我們沒有錢，沒有賺錢的工作。我們沒有錢，而且男人們在山上找尋食物。
#e Women did the weaving at home.
#c 在家編織是女人們的事。
#e Fireweeds were for the meals.
#c 我們的菜是山茼蒿。
#e They were really fireweeds in the mountains.
#c 真的是山上的山茼蒿。
#e We plucked fireweeds and so we had some vegetable and seeds.
#c 摘山茼蒿，然後有一點青菜和菜籽。
#n paruxaw 「青菜」
#e We sowed some of the seeds on the dry land, and what grew there was for eating.
#c 播一些菜籽在旱地，然後那邊種的就當菜來吃。
#e We did not use oil either.
#c 也沒有用油。
#n Avura' 為「食用油/汽油/潤滑油」，為日文借字
#e We used no oil.
#c 沒有用油。
#n Siyus為擬聲字(高溫物體碰到水的結果)
#e We cooked without oil. In the past, our food could only be cooked with water.
#c 沒有用油煮菜，以前還是只能用水煮。
#n Tumahuk 為標準發音，tahki為簡略發音
#n Hugal 「下面」
#n Hugal 「下面」
#e And we weren't able to go to the lower ground because we had no money to go to the lower ground.
#c 還有我們也不會去下面(山下)，因為我們沒有錢去平地。
#e After a long time, and we were able to go down to the lower ground.
#c 很久之後，然後，我們就能去下面囉。
#e (We) went there. We had money. We went to work and earned some money.
#c 去，嗯，有錢了，去工作賺了一點錢。
#e After having some money, we went to the lower ground to buy some food.
#c 有錢之後我們會去下面平地買一點菜。
#e We went to buy food, and we did so on foot. There was no car before.
#c 我們去買菜，然後用走的喲。以前沒有車子。
#n Raramat為標準發音，ramat為簡略發音
#n Pa-hakay 指(小孩)將要走路
#e (I) walked to Pakaragiyax.
#c 我走路去大湖。
#e I would bring the mealbox with me.
#c 我會帶便當。
#e I went to Samkayk to have fermented soybean curd.
#c 我去Samkayk(吃)豆腐乳。
#e In the past it took one day to walk to Pakaragiyax.
#c 以前去大湖走路要走一天。
#e (We) walked there, because there was no car before.
#c 我們走路，因為以前沒有車子。
#e And I went there to have lunch, and then I walked back. It just took one day, and
#e by the time the sun had set.
#c 然後我去那邊吃中飯，然後再走路回來。這樣就一天了，就天黑了。
#n Kumuriax 為正確發音，ka ri'ax為口誤，「中飯」之意。
#e It was unlike now that it takes you just a little time to go back and forth.
#c 不像現在你去的時候，去一下子，又回來。
#n su pilapilag為片語，意指「一下子」
#n su pilag為片語，意指「去年」
#e You can come back quickly because now we have cars.
#c 你會很快回來，因為有車。
#n Ini' kanga 為片語，意指「很快」
#e The life before was not good.
#c 以前是生活不好。
#e There was no money.
#c 以前沒有錢。
#e The old men had no money before.
#c 以前老人家們也沒有錢。
#e Yes.
#c 是啊。
#e Father and Mother brought us to work.
#c 父母親帶我們去工作。
#e They (the parents) would bring us to work, and taught us how to do it. At the beginning of my childhood I did not study.
#c 他們會帶我們去工作，教我們怎麼做事。小時候一開始我沒有上學讀書。
#n arring-un (受焦型，開始讓人生氣)
#n manarring 為標準發音，arring為簡略發音
#e It was just sowing.
#c 就是播種。
#e It was just sowing and rice plants.
#c 就是播種，還有稻秧。
#n pati' 為稻秧，水田或是旱田作物皆可指稱。
#e (We) sowed and grew the Chinese silk plants.
#c 我們播種然後種苧蔴。
#n pumuwa-un (種植，受焦型)；pumuwa-an (種植，處焦型)
#e The Chinese silk plants.
#c 苧蔴。
#e (We) had it peeled off there and sold the Chinese silk plants.
#c 我們把它去皮然後賣掉苧蔴。
#n kamagis-un (去皮，受焦型)；vinas-an (責罵，處焦型)
#e What is it?
#c 是什麼?
#e There was some for weaving.
#c 有些拿來編織。
#n ruma所指份量，稍大於tikay；ruma ka/na kgi；tikay ka kegi '一些苧蔴'
#e (We) took the dry Chinese silk plants (for weaving).
#c 我們拿乾的苧蔴。
#e We grew a lot of Chinese silk plants and had some for weaving, some for trading.
#c 我們種了很多苧蔴，有些拿來編織。有些拿來賣。
#e There was just buying. There was selling Chinese silk plants and dry Chinese silk plants.
#c 就是有拿來賣。有賣苧蔴和乾的苧蔴。
#e We had money because there was a lot of Chinese silk plants.
#c 因為有很多苧蔴，所以我們有錢。
#e We grew Chinese silk plants just. We went to sell (them ) and we had money.
#c 我們種苧蔴，拿去賣然後就有錢了。
#n hal-an (去，處焦型，通常指有交通工具的移動)
#n mativaynay 為標準發音，mavaynay為簡略發音
#n mavaynay 一字可為「買」或「賣」，依語境而選擇。
#e In the very beginning, there was nothing that we grew for sale.
#c 一開始的時候，沒有東西可以種來賣。
#n Han似乎為附著詞，跟隨動詞後。ma-niq han su bawwak ru ma-niq la su paruxaw「我先吃山豬肉再吃菜」
#e The dry Chinese silk plants. (The Chinese silk plants were) dried and tied together.
#e They were dried by sunshine and tied together
#c 乾的苧蔴曬乾後綁在一起。
#e A lot of them were dried and tied together.
#c 很多都曬乾再綁起來。
#n vakuwi語意不明。
#e (We ) made (them) threads.
#c 我們再把它們製成線。
#n patisa-an(製線的其中一個過程，處焦型)
#e (We) made (them) threads.
#c 我們做成線。
#n palawsun為製線其中過程之一
#e (We) made (them) threads.
#c 我們做成線。
#e (We) made (them) threads.
#c 做成線。
#n magawayay為製線過程之一；Gawayay-un (受焦型)
#e (We) made (them) threads and cooked (for later dying).
#c  做成線之後拿去煮。
#e (We) had (them) cooked, exposed to the sun, and dried.
#c  煮了之後拿去曬乾。
#n m-arngu ku ya-yamin=mu la「我的鞋子乾了。」
#e (We) immersed the things (for dying) to be mixed.
#c  把這些東西拿去浸。
#n si'iymaw (攪拌、混合，予焦型)；hahanga-an (浸泡之處)
#n 染色只用單純的顏色，沒有混合各種顏色調出新色的方式
#n asi語意上修飾其後的動詞，單獨使用時根據語境有「只能」、「只有」等語意。和特定的功能詞使用時則修飾其後的命題，有「必要」（asi ki）、「好像」（asi ga）等語意。目前將此類用法合併為一個單位標記。
#n asi語意上修飾其後的動詞，單獨使用時根據語境有「只能」、「只有」等語意。和特定的功能詞使用時則修飾其後的命題，有「必要」（asi ki）、「好像」（asi ga）等語意。目前將此類用法合併為一個單位標記。
#e A lot of (dying ingredients). There must be things (dying ingredients) to be mixed.
#c 很多的(染料)。一定要有攪拌的東西。
#e Black is black. The millet color is the millet color. Green is then Green.
#c  黑色的就是黑色，小米色的就是小米色，綠色的就是綠色。
#n matasiq (此色範圍包涵中文所指的綠色、藍色和靛色)
#e And the (threads) was immersed.
#c 然後用那個浸泡。
#n na 類似英文介系詞with，意為「使用」
#e It's black.
#c  就是黑色。
#e We had the threads immersed with the leaves of Lagerstroemia Subcostata, and we
#e had them immersed in mud.
#c 我們用九芎樹的葉子浸，浸在稀泥裡。
#n slaq意指「稀泥；水田」
#n qamas-un (浸泡，受焦型)
#n qamas-un (浸泡，受焦型)
#e (We had them) immersed with leaves of.First with the leaves of Lagerstroemia
#e Subcostata.
#c 用葉子浸，先用九芎樹的葉子。
#e (We) beat the leaves of Lagerstroemia Subcostata with force and mixed them with
#e the threads.
#c  我們用力搥打九芎樹的葉子，再和線混合。
#n s<um>hu' (上下式搥打；搗麻糬時的動作)
#n Tapaq-un (上下式用力搥打或拍打)
#n Tatapaq-an (搥打食物、藥品之處)
#e And we went to immerse (the threads) in the field. (We) really did so in the field of
#e watery mud.
#c 然後我們去浸在田裡，真的在水田裡這樣做。
#n lamlam，客語借字，意指「稀泥」
#e (We) went to (have them) immersed and took them out two days later.
#c  浸在那裡然後兩天後再拿出來。
#n i makarusa 片語，「兩天後」
#n cu makarusa 片語，「兩天前」；karusa-un (使...成對，受焦型)
#n h<um>angu (浸泡，主焦型)；hanga-un (浸泡，受焦型)
#n al-an (拿起，處焦型)
#e Then it turned black.
#c  就變成黑色了。
#n 薯榔有兩個稱呼maru 或是 kamti'
#n 薯榔有兩個稱呼maru 或是 kamti'
#e And Dioscorea Matsudae. Dioscorea Matsudae. We had them immersed with Dioscorea Matsudae and there were grasses to make them greeen.
#c 然後，薯榔，薯榔。和薯榔一起浸泡，有草讓它們變綠。
#e There is such grass until now.
#c  到現在還有這種草。
#n paka kiya i imuwag i hiya ana sasan「他會在家直到明天。」
#n ana suku hani 片語，直到現在。
#e I would see that.
#c  我會看到那個。
#n mutux=mu為標準發音，mutumu為簡略發音
#e (We) pounded it and massaged the threads with it, so it was green.
#c  把它搗爛然後和線團揉合在一起，就變成綠色。
#n t<um>apaq (搗，主焦型)；si-tapaq  (搗，予焦型)
#n q<um>umas (揉，主焦型)；qumas-un  (揉，受焦型)；qumas-an (揉，處焦型)
#e There is a lot that I can't describe. I need to have it here.
#c  很多我都不會描述，要看到東西才行。
#e Yes.
#c 是啊。
#e It then becomes threads.
#c  就變成線了。
#n 此處不確定Pa'的語意。但整句語意為”變成線”。
#e (We) make it into balls of threads.
#c 就變成線團。
#e (We) coil them into balls.
#c 把它繞成線團。
#e (We) coil the threads (on the weaving box).
#c 我們把線繞(在織布機上)。
#e (We) coil the threads and weave.
#c 我們繞線(在織布機上)，然後編織。
#n 此處的lin應指linamu(挑好的顏色;挑好的東西)。
#n 此處的lin應指linamu(挑好的顏色;挑好的東西)。
#e And there is chosen stuff
#c 然後有配好的顏色。
#e If the chosen colors look good, others will say that you are good at weaving.
#c 顏色配得好看，(別人)就說(這個人)很會做(編織的)事。
#e The elderly said that if they were not able to choose nice color (combination), then
#e they could only pick some at random.
#c 老人家這麼說，如果不會(配色)，就是他們只好隨便(配)，沒有挑好色。
#n Tamalx 為副詞性動詞詞根，後接主焦型動詞。T<in>amalx-an 受焦型。
#n asi tamalx-i i t<um>ahuk ku raramat ‘Just cook the vegetable as you wish.'
#e Well, no, no.
#c 喲，沒有，沒有。
#e Its meaning is like that.
#c 它意思就像那個。
#n imi為「意義」，日文借字。
#e Our tribemen do not have such a convention.
#c 本族人沒有這個習俗。
#n itaal專指泰雅族人。
#n 泰雅織布習俗之一為男人不碰織布器具。
#e No one says that there must be certain ways of pattern weaving.
#c 沒有人說它(紋路的編織)必須有方向。
#n 依錄音內容，泰雅編織圖樣以個人創意為主，沒有固定的模式。
#e  Sometimes there must be some pattern for my chosen colors.
#c  有時候我配好的顏色要有某些紋路。
#e Some say that (we) have to follow a pattern in weaving, but it is not so.
#c 有人說一定照著某個模樣，可是沒有這樣子。
